ygData.subject: RE: Steel Boning
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok it s useless so I will take it off your hands.... Ok actually its used in making braced leathor armor.  A tailor will buy it from you.  How much? Depends on
ygData.messageBody:
Ok it's useless so I will take it off your hands....
Ok actually its used in making braced leathor armor. A tailor will buy
it from you. How much? Depends on a lot of things but as much as you
can get.
Bonzz

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ah DoDo [mailto:novaperson@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 3:45 PM
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Steel Boning
>
>From: Ah DoDo <novaperson@...>
>
>I just started making steel boning. What can it be used for? A smith
>told me you can make armour with it. Ok if I can make armour with it
>where would I find a book that descirbes the armour I can make? I took
>up smithing because 1. I can make my own armour 2. Craft weapons. 3.
>I can make magical weapons and armour. Does anyone out there know of
>any more smithing books? I have the two basic books.
>
>
>Thanks!
>
>Novice Smith
